image.description: URL of image to appear on the notification. Default is an appropriate icon for the priority level is used.

priority.description: Priority ranges from INFO_LOW to CRITICAL_HIGH. INFO_MEDIUM is default.

buttons.description: Text and icons for up to two notification action buttons.

label.desciption: The label to appear on the button

accesskey.desciption: The accesskey attribute set on the button

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: Identifier of the notification. If it is empty, this method generates an id. If it matches an existing notification, this method first clears that notification before proceeding with the create operation.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The id of the notification to be updated.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Contents of the notification to update to.

parameters.name: wasUpdated
parameters.description: Indicates whether a matching notification existed.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The id of the notification to be updated.

parameters.name: wasCleared
parameters.description: Indicates whether a matching notification existed.

parameters.name: notifications
parameters.description: The set of notifications currently in the system.

events.name: onButtonClicked
events.description: Fired when the user pressed a button in the notification.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The notificationId of the clicked notification.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: The label of the button clicked by the user.

events.name: onClosed
events.description: Fired when the user closes a notification.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The notificationId of the closed notification.
